hero_desc: Music videos, IRL shooting and high-retention editing. Fast delivery, strong pacing and clean visuals.
service_1_desc: Fast pacing, SFX, subtitles, music and retention-focused structure.
service_2_desc: Cinematic look, color grading, visual storytelling and pro delivery.

contact_desc: Tell me your idea and I’ll reply with timing, pricing and approach.
